com.rift.coad.daemon.deployment
Interface DeploymentDaemon

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
public interface DeploymentDaemon
extends java.rmi.Remote

This Daemon allows users to remotely upload either Daemons or any other file to the Coadunation server.

Method Summary
 void copyFile(byte[] file, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String location)
          This method is used when a user needs to remotely upload a file to the Coadunation server.
 void daemonDeployer(byte[] file, java.lang.String name)
          This method is used when a user wishes to remotely deploy a Daemon to Coadunation.
 

Method Detail

daemonDeployer

void daemonDeployer(byte[] file,
                    java.lang.String name)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                           DeploymentDaemonException
This method is used when a user wishes to remotely deploy a Daemon to Coadunation.

Parameters:
file - This is a byte[] containing the contents of the jar file.
name - This is the name of the Daemon. Please note that for a windows installation it will require that the extension be included in the name.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
DeploymentDaemonException

copyFile

void copyFile(byte[] file,
              java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String location)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
This method is used when a user needs to remotely upload a file to the Coadunation server.

Parameters:
file - This is a byte[] containing the contents of the file.
name - This is the name of the file.
location - This is the location that the file will be stored. Please note the for a windows installation the name will have to include the extension.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
